thread.title: Kim Kardashian and Kanye West unveil their new kids line
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian and Kanye West unveil their new kids line | Daily Mail Online

author: Kirby Kristen For Dailymail.com
title: Kim Kardashian and Kanye West unveil their new kids line
text:
North West is only three years old, but she's already begun her career as a model and a fashion designer.
Kim Kardashian West took to Snapchat to unveil she and husband Kanye West's new kids clothing line on Tuesday.
The 36-year-old reality TV star also revealed that the couple's toddler lent a helping hand by picking out the color and fabric of the first outfit.
Scroll down for video
Coming soon! Kim Kardashian West took to Snapchat to unveil she and husband Kanye West's new kids clothing line on Tuesday. North West modeled the first outfit which she helped design
In the candid social media video little North looked precious as she showed off her new outfit, which she helped design.
The beautiful girl loved modeling her bright yellow ensemble for her famous mama who filmed the entire interaction.
Kim captioned one snapshot of North with: 'Kanye & my kids line coming soon!'
In the video, North modeled a shiny sequined highlighter yellow dress along with a coordinating chartreuse-colored shearling coat.
The adorable tot wore her hair in two side top knots and showed off her bubbly personality as well as her new duds.
Kim addressed her 'silly girl' who was playing by sweetly asking, 'Wait, let me see this outfit you've got on.'
The savvy star prompted her little one: 'Is that a Yeezy yellow shearling coat?'
'Silly girl': Kim addressed her 'silly girl' who was playing by sweetly asking, 'Wait, let me see this outfit you've got on'
She's a model! In the video, the three-year-old modeled a shiny sequined highlighter yellow dress along with a coordinating chartreuse-colored shearling coat
'I'm here!' Kim continued to attempt to get North's attention: 'Hey where's our model?'
Kim continued to attempt to get North's attention: 'Hey where's our model?'
'I'm here!' North exclaimed with a big smile.
Kim responded: 'Say, daddy and mommy are doing a kids line and these are some of the pieces.'
'Northie picked out the colors and the fabric,' The proud mother-of-two added.
Kim responded: 'Say, daddy and mommy are doing a kids line and these are some of the pieces'
She's a designer too! 'Northie picked out the colors and the fabric,' The proud mama added
She's a pro: At one point, the little model made the coffee table her very own runway
'Is that a Yeezy yellow shearling coat?' The savvy star prompted her little one
At one point, the little model made the coffee table her very own runway.
Later, Kim continued to update her followers with more candid snaps of she and her daughter.
Kim and North looked cute as they played around with all the app's filters.
Meanwhile, after keeping a relatively low-profile, Yeezy is set to have a fashion comeback.
Workin' it! The adorable tot wore her hair in two side top knots and showed off her bubbly personality as well as her new duds
Close up look! The beautiful girl loved modeling her bright yellow ensemble for her famous mama who filmed the entire interaction
The 39-year-old will unveil his Yeezy Season 5 range as part of New York Fashion Week, according to a Tuesday report from Fashionista .
It will not be as grandiose as his last two presentations, however, as the site claims it will be happening at Pier 59 Studios in the Chelsea Piers neighbourhood of Manhattan which is a popular place for events that week.
Kanye last unveiled his Yeezy Season 4 fashion range in collaboration with Adidas with an intricate outdoor presentation on Roosevelt Island back in September.
It was quite the memorable occasion as the lengthy catwalk show saw several models fainting due to the heat, while others tripped up on the runway.
Before that the Famous rapper unveiled the Yeezy Season 3 line with a huge show at Madison Square Garden in February of last year.
Later: Kim continued to update her followers with more candid snaps of she and her daughter
Bonding: The mother-of-two spent the day with her little girl
Pretty bunny! Kim and North looked cute as they played around with all the app's filters
It was at that presentation where West also unveiled his hit album The Life Of Pablo.
With the change in venue no doubt it will have more a fashion studio feel like his Yeezy Season 1 and 2 presentations.
Meanwhile, it has been quite a trying few months for the rapper and family as Kim was robbed of over $8.5 million worth of jewelry by gunpoint inside her room at the No Address Hotel in Paris back in early October.
Then in November, Kanye was rushed to hospital in Los Angeles after a psychotic breakdown, thought to be brought on by exhaustion.
The Stronger hit-maker seems to be doing much better as an insider told Entertainment Tonight on Tuesday that he has been staying busy but not taking on new projects yet.
'Kanye is doing a lot better. He stays to his schedule,' the source added. 'The family and Kim are trying to do everything they can to assure he doesnâ€™t have another episode.'
Kim and Kanye also have a one-year-old son named Saint.
Yeezus has risen! Kanye West will unveil his Yeezy Season 5 range as part of New York Fashion Week according to a Tuesday report from Fashionista
